entry.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens: XMTP real-time encrypted messaging is 🔥🔥 A shared inbox across all of your apps. I open sourced a real-time ...
entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens XMTP real-time encrypted messaging is 🔥🔥 A shared inbox across all of your apps. I open sourced a real-time app with @nextjs & @xmtp to get you started. The app uses the @LensProtocol namespace so you can inherit the 100K+ users of Lens off the bat 👇 https://github.com/dabit3/xmtp-chat-app-nextjs
